original: We have reconquered enough to be able to reintegrate the Imperial Austro-Hungarian lands into our Empire. Let us do so forthwith.
translation: 我们已经夺回了足够多的土地以重建我们的奥匈帝国。让我们立即行动起来。

original: Italy has come under our control, and we should reintegrate it into the empire in a glorious ceremony!
translation: 意大利已经处于我们的控制之下，我们应该举办一场光荣的典礼，将其整合入帝国！

original: The Levant has come under our control, and we should reintegrate it into the empire in a glorious ceremony!
translation: 黎凡特已经处于我们的控制之下，我们应该举办一场光荣的典礼，将其整合入帝国！
在埃及和突尼斯的伟大胜利

original: Egypt and Tunis have come under our control, and we should reintegrate them into the empire in a glorious ceremony!
translation: 埃及和突尼斯已经处于我们的控制之下，我们应该举办一场光荣的典礼，将其整合入帝国！
强化拉达那哥欣的传承

original: With the conquest of all Scandinavian territories, it is time to restore the spirit of the Kalmar Union. All Scandinavia shall prosper under our rule.
translation: 我们已然征服所有斯堪的纳维亚的领土，是时候恢复卡尔玛联盟的精神了。所有斯堪的纳维亚的土地都将在我们的统治下蓬勃发展。

original: The Nordics have long felt a certain affinity to one another. Now that we control all lands once belonging to the Nordic constituent states, it is possible to bring that kinship to new heights.
translation: 北欧人民早已感受到彼此之间的某种亲和力。现在我们控制着所有曾属于北欧的土地，我们有机会将这种亲情提升到新的高度。

original: Though the experiment of Gran Colombia was only short-lived a century ago, we have now once more succeeded in wresting control of its constituent territories. We may, once again, realize Bolívar's dream.
translation: 虽然一个世纪前的大哥伦比亚共和国最终夭折，但我们现在已经成功地重新控制了其组成领土。我们可能再次实现玻利瓦尔的梦想。

original: The old Austro-Hungarian lands have been conquered, and as their sole remaining successor state it depends on us to restore the Empire. Let us not tarry, and instead do so immediately.
translation: 奥匈帝国的旧地已经被我们征服，而作为仅存的继承国，我们应当重建帝国。让我应当立即着手此事，不得有误。

original: There is ample history between ourselves and Lithuania. Now that we are once again united through force of arms, perhaps it is time to revive the most glorious days of our past.
translation: 我们和立陶宛之间渊源颇深。现在我们已经通过武力再次统一，或许是时候重振过去最辉煌的日子了。

original: The Treaty of London in 1839 disgracefully separated the North and South of the lowlands, after an all-too brief period of unity. Now, under our leadership, we can recreate those days, and take our intended place as the counterweight to France and Germany.
translation: 1839年的伦敦条约将短暂统一的低地可耻地分裂为南北两部分。现在，在我们的领导下，我们可以重回往日的统一，并恢复我们应有的地位——足以和德法相抗衡的存在。

original: The powerful state our nation was a constituent of a century ago had an all-too-brief life-span. Now that we have conquered the secessionist states that caused its downfall, we can look towards reconstituting the federal republic, and begin projecting the power of a united Central America.
translation: 一个世纪以前，我们这个国家曾是一个强国的组成部分，虽然它过于短命。现在既然我们征服了导致其垮台的分裂国家，我们就可以着手重建联邦共和国，并开始规划一个统一的中美洲的力量。

original: Our previous declarations of regional solidarity and unified foreign policy can only be improved on now that we have the entire baltics under our control. Integrating our former neighbours will provide increased security for all, in the face of the dangers in the West and the East.
translation: 我们之前关于地区团结和外交统一政策的声明只有在我们掌握了整个波罗的海地区之后才能落实。面对西方和东方的危险，整合我们之前的邻居将为我们全体提供更多的安全保障。

original: Through force of arms we have managed to undo the losses we suffered as a result of our weakness in the Great War. To mark this historic occasion, nothing would serve better than proclaiming the restoration of the Ottoman Empire.
translation: 通过武力，我们讨回了在一战时的因贫弱而遭受的损失。为了纪念这历史性的时刻，没有比宣布恢复奥斯曼帝国更好的选择了。

original: Though the concept of a politically unified Europe has only gained any semblance of traction in the past few decades, our recent conquest of the most powerful continental European nations presents us with this unexpected reality. Perhaps a restructuring of the nation is required to take full advantage of the opportunities it offers us.
translation: 虽然在过去几十年里，政治统一欧洲的概念看起来只是获得了一些延伸，但近来我们征服了欧洲最强大的国家，意想不到的是，这使我们得到了将这个不切实际的想法实现的机会。我们可能需要对国家进行重组，才能充分利用它为我们提供的机会。

original: Having rid the southern parts of the continent from colonial influences, it is perhaps time to rally the people behind the concept of a powerful empire from our past. Multiple have existed in this region, and we need only a name to serve as a symbol.
translation: 摆脱非洲大陆南部地区被殖民的影响后，也许是时候把怀念我们过去的强大帝国的人们聚集起来了。在这地区存在多种这样的人，而我们只需要一个名字作为一个符号。

original: The idea of an Empire spanning the Mediterranean has in recent years been revived in the popular mind. Now, our military campaigns have exceeded the wildest dreams of even our most ardent supporters, and we find ourselves on the cusp of being able to realize these ambitions. Roma invicta!
translation: 近年来，跨地中海帝国的想法重新开始广为认同。现在，我们的军事行动已经超出了我们最热心的支持者最疯狂的梦想，我们发现自己正处于能够实现这些雄心壮志的节点。罗马永不屈服！

original: Our recent conquests have reached the extents of the Persian Empire of old. With our region's rich history, how can we not take this opportunity to identify our realm as a continuation of the empires of yore?
translation: 我们最近已经征服了波斯帝国旧有的边界。凭借我们地区丰富的历史，我们怎能不借此机会将我们的领土确定为昔日帝国的延续？

original: Having rid our old territories of the Turkish yoke, we can now, with some propaganda, claim our nation is the successor of the very Empire the Turks ended five centuries ago. This heritage is sure to see our international prestige soar!
translation: 摆脱了土耳其的桎梏，我们现在可以通过一些宣传手段宣称我们的国家是土耳其人在五个世纪前终结的帝国的继承者。这一历史遗产肯定会让我们的国际声望飙升！

original: For too long have the Arabian states been divided by regional rivalries. Now that we have united the peninsula under our rule, we may at last announce the formation of a united Arabia!
translation: 阿拉伯国家由于地区竞争而分裂了太久了。现在我们已经将半岛统一于我们的统治之下，我们最终可能宣布组建一个统一的阿拉伯！

original: Many centuries ago, a great empire stretched the Indonesian archipelago and dominated its trade. We have succeeded in expanding our borders to encompass the extent of this empire, and its recreation may well serve as a symbol of the region's unity.
translation: 许多世纪前，一个伟大的帝国囊括印度尼西亚群岛并主宰了它的贸易。我们成功地扩展了我们的边界，以涵盖这个帝国的疆域，它的重建可能成为该地区统一的象征。
强化拉达那哥欣的传承

original: In recent years we have moved away from the traditional values our nation was originally founded upon. Now that we have reached the territorial extent from our glory days, perhaps it is time to embrace our history more tightly.
translation: 近年来，我们摆脱了我们国家赖以立国的传统价值观。现在我们已经达到了我们黄金时代的领土范围，也许是时候更加紧密地拥抱我们的历史了。

original: The splendor of our Kaiserin knows no bounds, and neither do the borders of our nation. These have now grown to encompass the limits of the old Holy Roman Empire, and the nations in our way are no longer in a position to object to our policies. The Kaiserin has decreed that the current opportunity shall be seized, and that the nation shall embrace its role as the spiritual successor of the Holy Roman Empire. Aquila Elegit Iovis Omnia Vincit!
translation: 我们女皇的荣光永无止境，我们的国界线亦然。这二者现在都已经延伸到旧神圣罗马帝国的全域，而那些挡路的国家也已经无法再反对我们的政策。女皇陛下已经降旨，命令我们抓住目前的机会，宣布我国为神圣罗马帝国的精神继承者。Aquila Elegit Iovis Omnia Vincit（朱庇特选中的雄鹰征服一切）！
宣告成立大德意志帝国

original: Our enemies have been brought low before us, and our goals of expansion into the East have been accomplished. Now is the time to make the world understand the greatness of our nation, and to begin the transformation of our capital into something all can look to with pride.
translation: 我们的敌人已经弱于我们，我们扩张到东方的目标也已经完成。现在是时候让世界了解我们国家的伟大，并开始将我们的首都改造为所有人都可以带着自豪看待的东西。
宣告成立大德意志帝国

original: Hold 'We Shall Fight on the Beaches' Speech
translation: 举办“我们将战斗于海滩”的演讲

original: 'We shall go on to the end. We shall fight in France, we shall fight on the seas and oceans, we shall fight with growing confidence and growing strength in the air, we shall defend our island, whatever the cost may be. We shall fight on the beaches, we shall fight on the landing grounds, we shall fight in the fields and in the streets, we shall fight in the hills; we shall never surrender...'
translation: “我们将坚持到最后。我们将战斗于法国，我们将战斗于海洋，我们将以越来越大的信心和力量战斗于空中，我们将不计成本地捍卫我们的岛屿。我们将在战斗于海滩上，我们将战斗于登陆场，我们将战斗于田野和街头，我们将战斗于山中；我们决不会投降…………”

original: 'We Shall Fight on the Beaches' Speech

The newly-independent nation of Iceland occupies an extremely strategically-important location in the North Atlantic. Loss of Norway would put the defenseless island in a vulnerable position. We must beat our enemies to the invasion and occupation of Iceland, lest they obtain the island's strategic bases from which they might endanger our supply lines. Only with our protection will the Icelanders be safe from our enemies.
translation: 新独立的冰岛国占据了北大西洋极具战略重要性的地区。挪威的陷落将使这座毫无防卫的岛屿处于弱势。我们必须击败入侵冰岛的侵略者，他们正在观察岛上的战略基地，从而可能危及我们的供应线。只有在我们的保护下，冰岛人才能安全地远离我们的敌人。

original: We must secure the safety of our convoys by any means necessary. An invasion of Ireland may not be palatable to some of us, but if that is what it takes to acquire the use of their air bases, then so be it.
translation: 我们必须以任何必要的手段确保船队的安全。我们中的一些人可能并不认同入侵爱尔兰，但如果这就是得到并利用他们的空军基地的代价，那么就这么做吧

original: We must secure the safety of our convoys, and to achieve this, Irish air and naval bases are of the utmost importance. We will send an envoy to propose a trade of Northern Ireland in return to the immediate entry of Ireland into the war, on our side.
translation: 我们必须确保船队的安全，为此，爱尔兰的空军和海军基地至关重要。我们将派遣一名特使为他们提供北爱尔兰的贸易，以换取爱尔兰立即进入战争，加入我们一方。

original: Hold 'Blood, Toil, Tears, and Sweat' Speech
translation: 进行“热血、辛劳、汗水和眼泪”的演讲

original: 'I have nothing to offer but blood, toil, tears and sweat. [...] You ask, what is our policy? I will say: It is to wage war, by sea, land and air, with all our might and with all the strength that God can give us; to wage war against a monstrous tyranny, never surpassed in the dark and lamentable catalogue of human crime. That is our policy. You ask, what is our aim? I can answer in one word: Victory. Victory at all costs—Victory in spite of all terror—Victory, however long and hard the road may be, for without victory there is no survival.'
translation: “我所能奉献的，只有热血和辛劳，眼泪和汗水。[...]你们问：我们的政策是什么？我说，我们的政策就是用上帝所给予我们的全部能力和全部力量，在海上、陆地上和空中进行战争。同一个邪恶悲惨的人类罪恶史上从为见过的穷凶极恶的暴政进行战争。这就是我们的政策。你们问：我们的目的是什么？我可以用一个词来答复：胜利——不惜一切代价去争取胜利，无论多么恐怖也要去争取胜利；无论道路多么遥远和艰难，也要去争取胜利；因为没有胜利，就不能生存。 ”
“热血、辛劳、汗水和眼泪”的演讲

original: Hold 'This Was Their Finest Hour' Speech
translation: 进行“他们最光辉的时刻”的演讲

original: 'Let us therefore brace ourselves to our duties, and so bear ourselves, that if the British Empire and its Commonwealth last for a thousand years, men will still say, This was their finest hour.'
translation: “因此，让我们为自己的使命而努力，并承担起自己的责任，当大英帝国及英联邦长存千年后，人们仍会说，这是他们最光辉的时刻。”
进行“他们最光辉的时刻”的演讲

original: The French fleet has fallen into the hands of Vichy France, and we cannot allow for it to fall into German hands. No matter how sickening, we must demand the immediate surrender of our former ally's navy, under threat of bombardment.
translation: 法国的舰队落入了维希法国的手中，我们不能让它再落入德国人之手。无论多么令人不快，我们都必须要求我们之前盟友的海军立即投降，以轰炸为威胁。

original: Foreign forces are making a push to forcibly take control of our naval forces. We cannot allow this to happen, and must scuttle our ships!
translation: 外国势力正在试图强行控制我们的海军。我们不能允许这种情况发生，所以必须破坏我们的这些船只！

original: As men leave to go to war, thousands of women take up jobs in factories to keep the war machine running.
translation: 当男人去参加战争时，成千上万的女性在工厂中工作以保持战争机器的运转。

original: With the current political climate in Europe, a number of scientists have decided to leave their home country. They have applied for an entry visa in our country. Granting it will give us a bonus to research, but will also upset some people who consider this to be an internal matter that we shouldn't get involved in.
translation: 介于欧洲目前的政治气候，一些科学家决定离开他们的祖国。他们已申请入境我国的签证。提供签证将给我们的研究带来好处，但有些人认为这是他国内务，我们不应介入，这会使他们感到不安。
给德国科学家提供签证
给意大利科学家提供签证

original: To obtain a good staging area for the invasion of Norway we need to move on Denmark first.
translation: 为了获得一个入侵挪威的好地点，我们要先移动到丹麦。

original: Norway is a critical strategic point and would be an obvious point of attack for any enemy wanting to disrupt our steel trade with Sweden. We cannot risk our enemies setting up bases in this region.
translation: 挪威是一个战略上的关键点，对于任何想要破坏我们与瑞典之间钢铁贸易的敌人来说，这也是一个明显的攻击点。我们不能冒险让敌人在这个地区建立基地。

original: An attack through Belgium forces us to go through too narrow a front. We must expand our war plan to include the Netherlands to avoid the mistakes made in 1914.
translation: 来自比利时方向的攻击使我们的前线过于狭窄。我们必须扩大我们的战争计划，使其包括荷兰，以避免在1914年犯下过的错误。
黄色计划 - 比利时与卢森堡

original: An attack through the Maginot Line is suicide. We will flank it to the north and move through the Ardennes to bypass the heaviest fortifications.
translation: 进攻马奇诺防线无异于自杀。我们将沿它的侧翼向北，然后穿过阿登地区来绕过最严密的防御工事。

original: Evacuating the heavy machinery of our Moscow factories to the Urals is a huge undertaking, but it is necessary to secure our war production.
translation: 撤离我们莫斯科工厂的重型机械至乌拉尔是一个庞大的工程，但这对保证我们的战时产出是必需的。

original: §RThese effects require control of Moscow when the decision times out.§!
translation: §R当决议超时时，需要我们控制莫斯科这些效果才会生效。§!

original: Evacuating the heavy machinery of our Leningrad factories to the Urals is a huge undertaking, but it is necessary to secure our war production.
translation: 撤离我们列宁格勒工厂的重型机械至乌拉尔是一个庞大的工程，但这对保证我们的战时产出是必需的。

original: §RThese effects require control of Leningrad when the decision times out.§!
translation: §R当决议超时时，需要我们控制列宁格勒这些效果才会生效。§!
迁移斯摩棱斯克的工业

original: Evacuating the heavy machinery of our Smolensk factories to the Urals is a huge undertaking, but it is necessary to secure our war production.
translation: 撤离我们斯摩棱斯克工厂的重型机械至乌拉尔是一个庞大的工程，但这对保证我们的战时产出是必需的。

original: §RThese effects require control of Smolensk when the decision times out.§!
translation: §R当决议超时时，需要我们控制斯摩棱斯克这些效果才会生效。§!

original: Some factories will need to be rebuilt!
It is time to finish retreating. Not one step back!
translation: “是时候停止撤退了。绝不后退！”

original: Execute Scorched Earth in the Baltics
translation: 在波罗的海周边地区执行焦土战术

original: Execute Scorched Earth in the approaches to Moscow
translation: 对通往莫斯科的沿路执行焦土政策
在白俄罗斯执行焦土政策

original: Execute Scorched Earth in the Caucasus
translation: 在高加索执行焦土政策
在乌克兰执行焦土政策

original: Execute Scorched Earth in the approaches to Stalingrad
translation: 对通往斯大林格勒的沿路执行焦土政策

original: Enables creation of certain Reichskommissariat subjects out of controlled territory.\n\n
translation: 允许在控制的领土上建立数个帝国总督府傀儡。\n\n
帝国比利时-北法兰克总督府

original: Reinstate Prince Wilhelm's Right of Succession
translation: 恢复威廉王子的继承权

original: Kaiser Wilhelm III's son was forced to renounce his right of succession by desiring to marry against the approval of the then-head-of-family Wilhelm II. As Wilhelm III has now taken over that role, he might be able to pressure his exiled father in supporting a reversal of this decision.
translation: 威廉三世的儿子曾因想要违抗曾经的家族族长威廉二世的旨意结婚，而被迫放弃了继承权。现在威廉三世接过了族长的角色，他可以对他的流亡中的父亲试压，以撤销这一决定。

original: The line of succession is altered.\n

The current Kaiser's son, the to-be Wilhelm IV, only has two daughters as heirs. We must secure the line of succession, and so the succession laws must be modernized to allow Princess Felicitas to reign, when the time comes.
translation: 现任皇帝的儿子，将来的威廉四世，只有两个女儿作为继承人。我们必须确保继承的顺序，因而继承法必须现代化，在那一天来临时，允许费利西塔斯公主统治。
要求恢复在英国的头衔

original: In 1917 the British parliament voted to revoke all British peerages and royal titles from German Royal and Princely families. Now that we are allies, and are enjoying excellent relations, perhaps it is time to request the reversal of this decision.
translation: 在1917年，英国议会投票废除了来自德国皇室和诸侯家族的贵族和王室头衔。现在我们是盟友了，并且有着极好的关系，也许是时候请求废除这一决定了。

original: This will undoubtedly lead to unparalleled rewards...\n
translation: 这毫无疑问会带来空前的结果···\n

original: As we are at war with the [SOV.GetName], we require passing our armies through [POL.GetAdjective] territory. As we have vowed to protect them, it is only natural that they should join our war.
translation: 我们在与[SOV.GetName]交战，我们需要让我们的部队通过[POL.GetAdjective]领土。因为我们已经发誓保护他们， 所以很自然的他们应该加入我们的战争。

original: Request for other Austro-Hungarian successor states to re-form the Empire.\n§RIf they accept, you will inherit all wars they are involved in!§!\n
translation: 对其他奥匈帝国分解出的国家请求重建帝国。\n§R如果他们同意，你会卷入他们参与的所有战争！§!\n

original: More equipment is desperately needed on the front. We urgently need to convert more factories to produce arms and vehicles to defend our country.
translation: 前线急需更多装备。我们迫切的需要转换更多的工厂来生产武器和载具来保卫我们的国家。

original: The our troops urgently need more equipment. More factories are needed to produce the equipment required to win the war.
translation: 我们的部队迫切的需要更多装备。我们需要更多的工厂来生产赢得战争所需要的装备。

original: As the world burns around us, our people are woefully unprepared for war. We must rally their support to take up arms for our nation.
translation: 我们周遭的世界正处于战火中，不幸的是我们的人民却对战争毫无准备。我们必须集结他们的支持，让他们为我们的国家拿起武器。

original: We can't fall back any further. Our soldiers have to dig in and hold the line.
translation: 我们已经不能再退后了。我们的士兵必须掘壕固守并维持战线。

original: We need more resources for our war economy, and war bonds are just the way to obtain these.
translation: 为我们的战争经济，我们需要更多的资源，而战争债券正是获取它们的方法。

original: The German Armed Forces must be prepared to crush Soviet Russia in a rapid campaign. The bulk of the Russian Army will be destroyed by daring operations led by armored spearheads.
translation: “德国装甲部队必须准备好，以一次快速的进攻摧毁苏维埃联盟。大部分的俄国军队将被装甲先锋的无畏行动所摧毁。”

original: The enemy has set foot on the soil of our proud nation. The American people will rise up and push the invaders back into the sea!
translation: 敌人已经站在了我们骄傲的祖国土地上。美国人民将会奋起并将入侵者赶回海里！

original: A new leader has assumed the role of First Minister in the [ENG.GetName]. We must open a personal dialogue with him, helping us to prepare and coordinate for our inevitable entry into the war.
translation: 在[ENG.GetName]，一位新的领袖已经担任了首相。我们必须与他进行私人对话，为我们终将参战而帮助我们准备与协调。

original: If isolationist elements would have it their way, we would be defenseless against any hostile nation. For our own good, we must begin deconstructing the prevalent isolationist rhetoric.
translation: 如果孤立主义分子让这件事按他们的方式走下去，我们在面对任何敌对国家时毫无防备。为了我们的好，我们必须开始瓦解盛行的孤立主义言论。

original: France has fallen, and Britain now stands alone against the aggressor, struggling to defend its shores against invasion. Through fiery rhetoric they have indicated their resolve is as strong as ever, and they do not intend to go silently into the night. We owe it to democracy to ensure they are given the means to defend their freedom.
translation: 法国已经陷落，而英国现在独自对抗侵略者，努力的保卫她的海岸抵抗入侵。他们通过激烈的言论表明他们的决心与以往一样强大，而他们并不打算就此沉寂，衰落。我们应该为了民主，确保他们有手段捍卫自己的自由。

original: Though we shall not yet be dragged into the conflict, we can aid our friends by being their arsenal. Let us make the people understand why this is needed.
translation: 尽管我们还不应该被拖入战争中， 我们可以通过成为他们的兵工厂来援助我们的朋友。让我们让人民了解为什么这是必需的。

original: Can you use an electric mixer? If so, you can learn to operate a drill. Throughout the war, over six million American women took up in factories, construction and other physical labor and forever proved that women could do the job just as well as men.
translation: 你能用电动搅拌机吗？ 如果是这样，您可以学习操作钻孔机。在整个战争中，超过六百万美国女性投身于工厂、建造以及其他体力劳动，并永远地证明了女性做这些工作可以和男性做得一样好。

original: Ronnie says: "Keep 'em Coming!" With our men serving in the army, the burden of our military production comes to rest on the shoulders of the women of our nation. Over the course of the war, 800,000 Canadian women took up the jobs those who enlisted left behind, forever proving that women could do the job just as well as men.
translation: 罗妮说：“让他们来！”当我国的男性在军队中服役时，军事生产的重任就落到了我们国家女性的肩膀上。在战争的过程中，八十万加拿大女性投身于这些入伍的人留下的工作，永远地证明了女性做这些工作可以和男性做得一样好。

original: There have been reports of Communist groups setting up Base Areas in remote areas of the country. We should send agents to confirm this, so that we can strike against them.\n[Root.GetDiscoveredInfiltration]
translation: 有报告称共产主义团体正在国家的偏远地区建立根据地。我们应该派遣特务证实此事，这样我们就可以袭击他们。\n[Root.GetDiscoveredInfiltration]

original: \n§HWe have not discovered any Communist Infiltration.§!
translation: \n§H我们没有发现任何共产主义渗透§!

\n§H已知被共产主义渗透的地区：§![283.GetNameIfInfiltration][597.GetNameIfInfiltration][598.GetNameIfInfiltration][607.GetNameIfInfiltration][608.GetNameIfInfiltration][614.GetNameIfInfiltration][615.GetNameIfInfiltration][621.GetNameIfInfiltration][744.GetNameIfInfiltration][746.GetNameIfInfiltration]。

original: An §HUprising§! will have the following effects:\n
translation: 一场§H起义§!将有如下效果：\n
§H基础设施§!和§H军用工厂§!将被破坏。\n

original: Communists will seize control of the state.\n
translation: 共产主义者将会夺取地区控制权。\n

original: Communist militia will appear in the state.\n
translation: 共产党民兵将在此地区出现。\n

original: Communist elite divisions will appear in the state.\n
translation: 共产党精锐部队将在此地区出现。\n

original: At least one nationalist state has been successfully §YInfiltrated§!.\n
translation: 至少一个中华民国地区已经被成功的§Y渗透§!。\n
没有正在§H渗透§!一个地区。\n
在这个地区没有侦测到§H渗透§!：\n
共产主义者在甘肃的渗透
共产主义者在山东的渗透
共产主义者在江苏的渗透
共产主义者在河南的渗透
共产主义者在北京的渗透
共产主义者在河北的渗透
共产主义者在山西的渗透
共产主义者在绥远的渗透
共产主义者在西安的渗透
共产主义者在鄂尔多斯的渗透

original: We have a §Y10%§! chance of detecting §YCommunist Cells§! in each state they are present.\n
translation: 我们有§Y10%§!的几率在每个他们存在的地区侦测到§Y共产主义者§!。\n

original: Our country is weakened by internal fighting while Japan clearly has designs on our territory. We must force the Nationalists and Communists to see reason and form a United Front.
translation: 我们的国家因内斗而衰弱，而日本显然对我们的领土有着打算。我们必须强迫国民党和共产党明白道理并形成统一战线。
将会从我们这里收到150架战斗机。\n

original: Will receive 100 fighters and 50 bombers from us.\n
translation: 将从我们这里收到100架战斗机和50架轰炸机。\n

original: Increase the Airlift over the Hump

translation: 共产主义者在冀东的渗透
共产主义者在热河的渗透
共产主义者在南察哈尔的渗透
共产主义者在察哈尔的渗透
共产主义者在黑龙江的渗透
共产主义者在辽宁的渗透

original: Intervene in the Hungarian Civil War
Intervene in the Romanian Civil War

In order to fund our growing military industry, and to keep this secret from British and French eyes, we have been forced to use a balance sheet entity to route payments to in the form of promissory notes. If we do not use our political connections to extend the due dates of these notes, we will be forced to repay them and will no longer receive their benefits.
translation: 为了资助我们成长中的军事工业，并在英国和法国的眼皮底下维持这个秘密，我们已经被迫使用一个资产负债表实体并以本票形式发放付款。如果我们不使用我们的政治关系来延长这些本票的到期日，我们将被迫承兑它们并不再获得它们的红利。

original: Our issued bills are soon falling due. We must decide whether to extend them or begin payments.
translation: 我们发行的债券就快要到期了。我们必须决定是要延长他们或是开始兑付。

original: Extend the MEFO Bills due date by another 3 months, allowing us to continue to enjoy their benefits for the duration. It will, however, also increase the cost of our eventual payments.
translation: 再次延长梅福劵的到期日三个月，允许我们在这段时间内继续享受它们的红利。然而，这也会增加我们最终支付时的花费。

original: Decide whether to extend '§YMEFO Bills§!' or begin payments.\n
translation: 决定延长“§Y梅福劵§!”或开始兑付。\n

original:
Issue a six-month extension of '§YMEFO Bills§!', to go into effect upon the due date of the current batch of MEFO bills.

The cost of each extension will progressively increase, until war breaks out, at which point reliance on MEFO bills is removed and payment is delayed until after the war's conclusion.
translation:
让“§Y梅福劵§!”延长六个月，并在当前批次的梅福劵到期之后生效。

每次延期的花费会一步步的增长，直到战争爆发，这时会移除对梅福劵的依赖，而兑付延迟到和谈结束之后。

original: If selected, the following will happen in [?Root.days_mission_timeout@GER_mefo_bills_mission|H0] days:\n
translation: 如果选择了，以下将在[?Root.days_mission_timeout@GER_mefo_bills_mission|H0]天后发生：\n

original: Less than 60 days since MEFO Bills were extended.
translation: 自梅福劵延期后不到60日。

original: The intent behind the creation of Vichy France was always to keep the French colonies and the French fleet out of the hands of the allies. However, it is an agreement we may choose to rescind at any time. We have a plan drawn up to forcibly integrate the area, as well as making a lightning push for the French fleet's base at Toulon.
translation: 建立维希法国的背后之意就是让法国殖民地与舰队不被盟军掌控。然而，这是一个我们随时可以废除的协议。我们制定了强制整合该地区的计划，同时也对在土伦的法国舰队基地进行一场闪电突击。

original: Our puppet state in France has outlived its usefulness. We will begin integration into the [Root.GetName] immediately, and, if we move sufficiently swiftly, we may even be able to commandeer the remnants of the French fleet.
translation: 我们在法国的傀儡政权已经失去了它的意义。我们将立即开始将其整合入[Root.GetName]，同时，如果我们行动的够快，我们甚至能征用法国舰队的残余部分。

original:
Annexes Vichy France in 7 days and seizes the French fleet.

§RFrance will be able to scuttle their fleet unless German troops are in Toulon within 2 days!§!
translation:
在七天内吞并维希法国并夺取法国舰队。

§R除非德国部队在两天内抵达土伦，否则法国将能够摧毁他们的舰队！§!

original: In the current situation, allowing fascist parties to continue to organize would undermine our ability to govern effectively. Drastic measures will need to be taken.
translation: 当前局势下，允许法西斯政党继续活动会削弱我们有效执政的能力。严厉的措施必须被采取。

original: The parties in the political center have been a thorn in the side of our government for too long. Their insistence on the 'rights' of the individual undermine our efforts to create a better nation for the whole of our population.
translation: 政治中心的政党是我们政府内长久以来的一根芒刺。他们对个人的“权利”的坚持会破坏我们为全体人民创造更美好的国家的努力。
改变民主主义主义的支持率：§G-§![?.Root.party_popularity@democratic|%0G]。\n

original: The Communist Party has been protesting against the government at every turn, sowing discontent and making it hard to govern. It is time to crack down on this.
translation: 每一次共产党都在抗议来反对政府，播种不满情绪并让我们难以执政。是时候做个了断了。
改变共产主义主义的支持率：§G-§![?.Root.party_popularity@communism|%0G]。\n

original: We must crack down on fascist elements in our nation for the sake of long-term domestic stability. Their influence is too great, and may potentially become a problem to the government.
translation: 为了局势的长期稳定，必须对国内的法西斯分子进行严厉打击。法西斯势力影响甚众，或许会成为当前政府的一大威胁。

original: We must crack down on democratic elements in our nation for the sake of long-term domestic stability. Their influence is too great, and may potentially become a problem to the state.
translation: 为了局势的长期稳定，必须对国内的民主分子进行严厉打击。民主势力影响甚众，或许会成为当前政府的一大威胁。

original: We must crack down on communist elements in our nation for the sake of long-term domestic stability. Their influence is too great, and may potentially become a problem to the government.
translation: 为了局势的长期稳定，必须对国内的共产分子进行严厉打击。共产势力影响甚众，或许会成为当前政府的一大威胁。

original: Our enemies are receiving foreign aid! We must issue a strong objection and demand the removal of any attachés.
translation: 我们的敌人正接受外国势力的援助！我们必须极力斥回任何专员。

original: Has not already received an extra building slot from infrastructure.
translation: 尚未从基建等级中收到额外的建筑槽位。

original: Has not already received an extra building slot from land appropriation.
translation: 尚未从基建等级中收到额外的建筑槽位。
民国领袖已到西安一叙
在中国的介入程度下降
升级对中国的战争态势

original: The end of the war is in sight. With a final push and determined effort we can bring the conflict to a swift conclusion. However, should we not be able to grasp victory within the next year, we may suffer internal instability as public opinion rises against the increased war effort...
translation: 战争眼见就要宣告终结。我们可以打出最后一击来迅速解决这场纷争。然而，要是我们在下一年内还不能取得胜利的话，那随着社会舆论对战争的影响不断加深，我们可能会面临来自内部的稳定问题……

original: No mainland §YChinese§! or §YKorean§! cores are controlled by §YJapan§! or any of its subjects.
translation: 大陆§Y中国§!地区或§Y朝鲜§!地区再无核心领土被§Y日本§!或其附庸所控。

original: We have lost our hold on the mainland. The Military thinks it is unlikely that we will be able to recover the lost territories. The civilian government suggests that we should seek terms to at least keep our soverignity over the islands.
translation: 我们失去了在大陆上的立足之地。军方认为我们已没有卷土重来的机会了。平民政府建议我们至少应该为保全岛上的领土而寻求一项和平协议。

original: We have lost our hold on the mainland. The Military thinks it is unlikely that we will be able to recover the lost territories. The civilian government suggests that we should seek terms to at least keep our sovereignity over the islands.
translation: 我们失去了在大陆上的立足之地。军方认为我们已没有卷土重来的机会了。平民政府建议我们至少应该为保全岛上的领土而寻求一项和平协议。

original: The enemy has employed a new and most cruel bomb. The war is developing not necessarily to our advantage. We must endure the unendurable.
translation: 敌新使用残虐爆弹，战局必不好转，时运所趋，只能堪所难堪、忍所难忍，欲以为万世开太平。

original: Execute nuclear strikes on Japanese soil
translation: 对日本领土进行核打击

original: The recent successful test of a nuclear bomb offers an alternative to a full-scale invasion of the Japanese Home Islands. Intelligence suggests that striking two places in the Home Islands with nuclear bombs in rapid succession will compel the Japanese government to surrender unconditionally.
translation: 最近的核试验成功表明，全面入侵日本本岛其实另有捷径。情报部门建议，对日本本岛两地进行核打击将有效迫使日本政府无条件投降。

original: We require assistance in our current civil war, and the closest likely supporters of our cause are the Soviets to our north. Perhaps we could trade the South Sakhalin Peninsula in return for a group of Soviet volunteer divisions.
translation: 我们的内战正需要援助，而离我们最近，最可能为我们革命提供支持的，也只有北方的苏联了。或许我们可以用南桦太换取一些苏联志愿军。

original: First nuclear strike on Japan executed
translation: 已实施第一次对日核打击

original: Second nuclear strike on Japan executed
translation: 已实施第二次对日核打击

original: The outrageous restrictions of the London Naval Treaty is a threat to the security of our nation. We must have the freedom to build a navy that can stand up to any nation that would challenge what is rightfully ours.
translation: 伦敦海军条约的蛮横限制威胁到了我国的安全。我们必须拥有建造舰队的自由，才能来对抗那些胆敢挑战我国合法权益的国家。

original: The first blow awaits. Afterwards, we must continue swiftly, using the momentum we have gained to cripple our enemies before they know what has happened.
translation: 第一波攻击队正在待命。无论如何，我们都必须迅速行动，充分利用敌明我暗的态势来尽可能削弱敌人。

original: Our allies in Europe have signed a non-aggression pact with the Soviet Union. However, our war cannot wait; we must unilaterally pursue a conflict with the Communists, even if it risks alienating our allies.
translation: 我们在欧洲的盟友已和苏联签订了互不侵犯条约。但我们可没法坐等良机逝去；我们必须和布尔什维克单方面开战，即使此举可能导致我们盟友的疏远。

original: Our geologists have found a number of promising resource deposits within our territories. We can spend some capital to develop these fields. Advances in extraction technology might make more deposits viable for exploitation.
translation: 我们的地质学家在我们的领土上发现了大片富矿。我们可以花费一些资金来采掘这些区域。在挖掘科技上的进步能让我们发现更多可利用的矿藏。

original: These are dangerous times and we can't allow dissenting voices to tear our country apart. Restricting the freedom of the press is necessary to ensure that the truth is heard loud and clear.
translation: 现在正是危难之际，我们绝不能让异见邪说分裂国家。有必要以限制出版自由的手段，来保证真理的声音清明嘹亮。

original: These are dangerous times and we can't allow dissenting voices to tear our country apart. Restricting the freedom of the press is necessary to ensure that the truth is heard loud and clear.
translation: 现在正是危难之际，我们绝不能让异见邪说分裂国家。有必要以限制出版自由的手段，来保证真理的声音清明嘹亮。

original: These are dangerous times and we can't allow dissenting voices to tear our country apart. Restricting the freedom of the press is necessary to ensure that the truth is heard loud and clear.
translation: 现在正是危难之际，我们绝不能让异见邪说分裂国家。有必要以限制出版自由的手段，来保证真理的声音清明嘹亮。

original: These are dangerous times and we can't allow dissenting voices to tear our country apart. Restricting the freedom of the press is necessary to ensure that the truth is heard loud and clear.
translation: 现在正是危难之际，我们绝不能让异见邪说分裂国家。有必要以限制出版自由的手段，来保证真理的声音清明嘹亮。

original: The Japanese imperialists took Manchuria away from its rightful owners - the free people of China. Now that our comrades in Japan have ousted the oppressors, we should ask that it is given back to the people.
translation: 日本帝国主义从中国自由的人民手中夺走了满洲。现在我们在日本的同志已起身推翻了压迫者，那我们也应当让他们把满洲还给中国人民。

original: The Imperial Navy and the Imperial Army are locked in a vicious conflict over our limited resources. We have instituted regular conferences to ensure our resources are spent in the right place. Favoring one over the other will have far-reaching consequences.
translation: 帝国海军和帝国陆军在有限的资源间陷入了恶性冲突。我们决定举行定期的会议，保证我们的好钢能用到刀刃上。偏爱双方中的一方都会造成更深远的影响。

original: The Imperial War Conference has convened in the last 6 months
translation: 距上次召开大本营会议已过去六个月

original: We must stand up against the threat of [From.GetName]. Our nation depends on every man doing their part to keep us safe.
translation: 我们必须起身反抗[From.GetName]的威胁。大家都人尽其责，才能保证我们的国家安全。

original: The nation calls for every man, woman and child. A war like that of [From.GetName] could happen here as well.
translation: 国家需要每个人的帮助，不管是男人，女人，还是孩童。一场对抗[From.GetName]的战争即将爆发。

original: Tomorrow [From.GetName] could be our enemy. We need YOU to defend your country TODAY!
translation: [From.GetName]明天就可能成为我们的敌人，我们今天就需要你来保家卫国！

original: Develop Aluminium Production in New York
Develop Aluminium Production in Washington State
Expand Iron Ore Mines in Cuba
Expand Iron Ore Mines in Quebec
Expand Iron Ore Mines in Newfoundland

translation: 在马达加斯加引种橡胶
扩展马达加斯加橡胶种植

original: Exploit Bauxite Deposits in West Africa
Expand Bauxite Mines in West Africa
Develop the Oil Fields in the Sirte
Develop Tungsten Mines in the Caucasus
Expand Tungsten Mines in the Caucasus

translation: 扩建车里雅宾斯克钢业
在兹拉托乌斯特修建钢厂
扩建兹拉托乌斯特钢厂

original: Develop Iron Ore Mines near Kursk
translation: 开发库尔斯克附近的铁矿

original: Expand Iron Ore Mines near Kursk
translation: 扩建库尔斯克附近的铁矿

original: Strip Mine Iron Ore Deposits near Kursk
translation: 深掘库尔斯克附近的铁矿

original: Develop Iron Ore Mines near Belgorod
translation: 开发别尔哥罗德附近的铁矿

original: Expand Iron Ore Mines near Belgorod
translation: 扩建别尔哥罗德附近的铁矿

original: Strip Mine Iron Ore Deposits near Belgorod
translation: 深掘别尔哥罗德附近的铁矿

original: We can suspend the IPCC should their work become actively harmful to the country. We can reinstate it later should the situation change.
translation: 考虑到他们的活动已威胁到国家的安全，我们需要暂停政治协商会议。如果以后局势发生变化，我们可以再恢复协商。

original: They will lose access to §Y[?THIS.CHI_burma_road_current_level]§! free military factories until the road is re-opened.\n
translation: 在我们重开公路之前，他们将失去§Y[?THIS.CHI_burma_road_current_level]§!座额外军用工厂。\n

original: They will lose access to §Y[?THIS.CHI_ledo_road_current_level]§! free military factory until the road is re-opened.\n
translation: 在我们重开公路之前，他们将失去§Y[?THIS.CHI_ledo_road_current_level]§!座额外军用工厂。\n

original: They will permanently lose access to §Y[?THIS.CHI_hanoi_route_current_level]§! free military factories.\n
translation: 他们将永久失去§Y[?THIS.CHI_hanoi_route_current_level]§!座额外军用工厂。\n

original: They will lose access to §Y[?THIS.CHI_the_hump_current_level]§! free military factory until the Hump is re-opened.\n
translation: 直到我们重开航线之前，他们将失去§Y[?THIS.CHI_the_hump_current_level]§!座额外军用工厂。\n

original: They will gain access to §Y[?THIS.CHI_burma_road_closed_level]§! free military factories.\n
translation: 他们将得到§Y[?THIS.CHI_burma_road_closed_level]§!座额外军用工厂。\n

original: They will gain access to §Y[?THIS.CHI_ledo_road_closed_level]§! free military factory.\n
translation: 他们将得到§Y[?THIS.CHI_ledo_road_closed_level]§!座额外军用工厂。\n

original: They will gain access to §Y[?THIS.CHI_the_hump_closed_level]§! free military factory.\n
translation: 他们将得到§Y[?THIS.CHI_the_hump_closed_level]§!座额外军用工厂。\n

original: Reopen Burma Road in this state.\n
translation: 重开此地区的滇缅公路。\n

original: Burma Road closed in this state.
translation: 此地区的滇缅公路已被关闭。

original: Reopen Ledo Road in this state.\n
translation: 重开此地区的中印公路。\n

original: Ledo Road closed in this state.
translation: 此地区的中印公路已被关闭。
重开此地区的空运航线。\n
此地区的空运航线已关闭。
已经在支持反法西斯战争
为反法西斯战争给予武器支持

original: Already attempting to resolve the crisis.

With the threat of war seeming distant, people are no longer willing to accept the hardships of wartime laws. We need to review our laws and consider changing them to quiet the protesters before the situation escalates.
translation: 战争的威胁似乎还很遥远，人们不再愿意接受严苛的战时法律。我们需要重新审视我们的法律，并考虑改变这些，在形势升级之前安抚抗议者

original: With the threat of war seeming distant, people are no longer willing to accept the hardships of a war economy. We should review our economic laws and consider changing them to produce more consumer goods to meet their demands.
translation: 战争的威胁似乎还很遥远，人们不再愿意接受严苛的战时经济政策。我们应该审视我们的经济政策，并考虑改变它们，生产更多的消费品以满足人民的需求

original: Unless solved quickly, the issue of recruits refusing the draft will only get worse and may lead to people questioning the authority of the government itself.
translation: 除非迅速解决，否则新兵拒服兵役的问题只会变得更糟，并可能导致人们对政府本身权威的质疑。

original: As a result of the Japanese civil war, [MAN.GetName] has broken free of Japanese rule. We have a golden opportunity to finally establish Soviet rule over the area, if we move quickly.
translation: 由于日本内战的结果，[MAN.GetName]已经脱离了日本的统治。如果我们迅速行动，那么我们有一个绝佳的机会在该地区建立苏维埃的牢固统治

original: We will return Manchuria to the only rightful people's regime in China.
translation: 我们将把满洲归还给中国唯一合法的人民政权。

original: Vocal political elements have begun to speak up in favor of fascist values, finding support with an increasing number of the population. The nation's path to fascism lies open, merely awaiting the choice of peaceful or violent transition.
translation: 主流的政治风向已经开始倾向赞成法西斯主义的价值观念，并且正在寻求越来越多的人的支持。国家通向法西斯的道路已经打开，只是在等待选择和平还是暴力的方式来过渡。

original: We have no time to wait for the slow changes in the minds of the people. For their own sake, we must force the matter swiftly, even if some may lose their lives in the process. Unlike a peaceful referendum, a civil war will cause tremendous devastation to our armed forces and the country's industry and infrastructure, but it is also quicker, and ensures we will be able to force our will through more forcefully afterwards.
translation: 我们没有时间去等待民心的缓慢改变。为了人民的利益，即使有些人可能在此过程中失去生命，我们也必须迅速处理这些问题。与和平公投不同，内战会对我国的工业、基础设施和军事实力都造成巨大的损失，但它完成的更快，并且之后可以更容易的将我们的意志得以实现。

original: We must ensure the continuing spread of support for our cause among the people, and encourage them to publically challenge the authority of the present government. As the position of the government is increasingly undermined and civil unrest continues to mount, it will become easier for us to achieve our goals. This holds especially true if, unlike a legal change in government, these goals involves a more... sinister means of regime change.
translation: 我们必须确保人民广泛持续的支持，鼓励他们公开挑战政府权威，因为政府的地位不断下降和社会不稳定因素继续上升会让我们更容易地达成目标。尤其是当这个目标是一个相比合法改变政府更加……险恶的政权交替方式。

original: Without ample support of the military, any hope of victory in an armed ideological struggle would be vain. We must ensure the loyalty of well-placed units of our military forces.
translation: 没有军队的充分支持，一切期望在意识形态的武装斗争中获得胜利都是徒劳的。我们必须确保我军部队中武装力量的绝对忠诚。

original: Each time army support is increased, 10% is added to the strength of your faction in the civil war, up to a maximum total strength of 70%.\n
translation: 每次军事支持的提升都会给你的阵营在内战中带来10%的力量，最多可以加到70%。\n
确保下层军官的忠诚度

original: It is possible certain generals harbor secret sentiments in favor of fascism. We must approach them and ensure their loyalty for when the fighting starts.
translation: 有可能某些军官秘密地赞成法西斯主义。我们必须拉拢他们并确保他们在战争开始时的忠诚。
确保上层军官的忠诚度

original: It is possible certain field marshals harbor secret sentiments in favor of fascism. We must approach them and ensure their loyalty for when the fighting starts.
translation: 有可能某些陆军元帅秘密地赞成法西斯主义。我们必须拉拢他们并确保他们在战争开始时的忠诚。

original: By skimming the nation's equipment stores we can create a minor cache of weaponry to aid us in our future struggle.
translation: 通过清点国家的武器库，我们可以调用一小部分武器来在将来的战争中支援我们。

original: The enemy has no idea of the impending calamity. We must ensure this remains so, all the while directing our battle plans to make maximum use of the element of surprise.
translation: 敌人不知道即将发生的灾难。我们必须确保次次如此，这将指导我们的作战计划，最大化的利用这种突然性。

original: The Surprise Attack Plan gives a 25% attack bonus to all divisions on core territory, for 30 days.\n
translation: 奇袭计划会为所有在核心领土作战的陆军师带来25%的攻击加成，持续30日。\n

original: The time has come to take the plunge. All preparations we deemed necessary have been made. There is no turning back now.
translation: 现在是时候冒险了。 我们认为所有必要的准备工作已经完成。 现在已经没有回头路了。

original: After the civil war, the time has now come to rebuild our ruined nation.
translation: 内战结束了，现在是在废墟上重建家园的时候了。

original: We must open up the acceptance of diverging viewpoints in the government. Perhaps this will eventually make it possible to affect a peaceful change in the politics of our nation.
translation: 我们必须公开接受政府中的不同声音。或许这最终可能会导致我国政局发生和平变革。

original: By pointing out our current government's many flaws we can make people think about the ideological causes of these failures.
translation: 通过指出我们目前政府的许多缺陷，我们可以让人们思考这些缺陷的意识形态原因。

original: With sufficient support, we may now safely hold a referendum to affect a change of government, without bloodshed.
translation: 在足够的支持下，我们现在可以安全地举行全民公投，不流血的影响政权更替。

original: Vocal political elements have begun to speak up in favor of democratic values, finding support with an increasing number of the population. The nation's path to democracy lies open, merely awaiting the choice of peaceful or violent transition.
translation: 主流的政治风向已经开始倾向赞成民主主义的价值观念，并且正在寻求越来越多的人的支持。国家通向民主的道路已经打开，只是在等待选择和平还是暴力的方式来过渡。

original: We have no time to wait for the slow changes in the minds of the people. For their own sake, we must force the matter swiftly, even if some may lose their lives in the process. Unlike a peaceful referendum, a civil war will cause tremendous devastation to our armed forces and the country's industry and infrastructure, but it is also quicker, and ensures we will be able to force our will through more forcefully afterwards.
translation: 我们没有时间去等待民心的缓慢改变。为了人民的利益，即使有些人可能在此过程中失去生命，我们也必须迅速处理这些问题。与和平公投不同，内战会对我国的工业、基础设施和军事实力都造成巨大的损失，但它完成的更快，并且之后可以更容易的将我们的意志得以实现。

As the position of the government is increasingly undermined and civil unrest continues to mount, it will become easier for us to achieve our goals. This holds especially true if, unlike a legal change in government, these goals involves a more... sinister means of regime change.
translation: 我们必须确保人民广泛持续的支持，鼓励他们公开挑战政府权威，因为政府的地位不断下降和社会不稳定因素继续上升会让我们更容易地达成目标。尤其是当这个目标是一个相比合法改变政府更加……险恶的政权交替方式。

translation: 没有军队的充分支持，一切期望在思想斗争中获得胜利都是徒劳的。我们必须确保我军部队中武装力量的绝对忠诚。
确保下层军官的忠诚度

translation: 有可能某些军官秘密地赞成民主主义。我们必须拉拢他们并确保他们在战争开始时的忠诚。
确保上层军官的忠诚度

translation: 有可能某些军官秘密地赞成法西斯主义。我们必须拉拢他们并确保他们在战争开始时的忠诚。

translation: 通过清点国家的武器库，我们可以调用一小部分武器来在将来的战争中支援我们。

translation: 现在是时候冒险了。 我们认为所有必要的准备工作已经完成。 现在已经没有回头路了。

translation: 在足够的支持下，我们现在可以安全地举行全民公投，不流血的影响政权更替。

translation: 敌人不知道即将发生的灾难。我们必须确保次次如此，这将指导我们的作战计划，最大化的利用这种突然性。

original: The time has come to take the plunge. All preparations we deemed necessary have been made. There is no turning back now.
translation: 现在是时候冒险了。我们认为所有必要的准备工作已经完成。 现在已经没有回头路了。

original: After the civil war, the time has now come to rebuild our ruined nation.
translation: 内战结束了，现在是在废墟上重建家园的时候了。

original: We must open up the acceptance of diverging viewpoints in the government. Perhaps this will eventually make it possible to affect a peaceful change in the politics of our nation.
translation: 我们必须公开接受政府中的不同声音。或许这最终可能会导致我国政局发生和平变革。

original: By pointing out our current government's many flaws we can make people think about the ideological causes of these failures.
translation: 通过指出我们目前政府的许多缺陷，我们可以让人们思考这些缺陷的意识形态原因。

original: With sufficient support, we may now safely hold a referendum to affect a change of government, without bloodshed.
translation: 在足够的支持下，我们现在可以安全地举行全民公投，不流血的影响政权更替。

original: Has military support for the civil war.\n
Has military support for the civil war.\n
Has military support for the civil war.\n

We cannot allow our enemies the use of the strategically vital Suez Canal. We must therefore begin preparations to inflict enough targeted damage to the canal so that it will remain out of commission for a lengthy duration. This will greatly limit the enemy's ability to move ships from Asia and East Africa into the Mediterranean.
translation: 我们不能让我们的敌人使用具有战略意义的苏伊士运河。因此，我们必须开始酝酿对运河加以足够的有针对性的损害，以便在很长时间内不能使用。这将极大地限制敌军将亚洲和东非的船只运送到地中海的能力。

original: We cannot allow our enemies the use of the strategically vital Panama Canal. We must therefore begin preparations to inflict enough targeted damage to the canal so that it will remain out of commission for a lengthy duration. This will greatly increase the difficulty for the enemy to move ships from the Pacific to the Atlantic, and vice versa.
translation: 我们不能让我们的敌人使用具有战略意义的巴拿马运河。因此，我们必须开始酝酿对运河加以足够的有针对性的损害，以便在很长时间内不能使用。这将极大地限制敌军将太平洋的船只运送到大西洋的能力，反之亦然。

original: The Suez Canal is of the utmost importance to our war effort. We must allocate any resources needed to the rebuilding of this great canal, so that we may use it to traverse ships and troops freely between the Mediterranean and the Indian Ocean.
translation: 苏伊士运河对我们的战争至关重要。我们必须调动任何必需的资源来修复这条重要的运河，以便我们可以用它在地中海和印度洋之间自已偶穿越舰船和军队运输。

original: The Panama Canal is of the utmost importance to our war effort. We must allocate any resources needed to the rebuilding of this great canal, so that we may use it to traverse ships and troops freely between the Pacific and the Atlantic Oceans." demand_tribute_from_new_communist_china:0 "Demand Increased Tribute
translation: 巴拿马运河对我们的战争至关重要。我们必须调动任何必需的资源来修复这条重要的运河，以便我们可以用它在太平洋和大西洋之间自由穿越舰船和军队运输。

original: The Kwantung Army shows little interest in helping the denizens of Manchuria, seeing it as a military occupation rather than nation building. The government of Manchukuo, such as it is, has been given few resources to maintain order by the Japanese. Into this vacuum of power pours all manner of bandits: sometimes self-styled 'freedom fighters', murdering and stealing in the name of abstract ideals like 'national liberation' or 'proletarian internationalism', but more often without any stated ideology to mask their abuses.
translation: 关东军对帮助满洲百姓毫无兴趣，与其说他们是来帮助我们建设国家的，不如说他们是来进行军事占领的。日本仅仅拨给满洲国政府很少的资源来帮助维持秩序。在这力量真空的区域，存在着各式各样的草寇:有些人自诩为“自由战士”，以抽象的理念例如“民族解放”或者“无产阶级国际主义”为名施行谋杀和偷窃，但更多时候没有任何明确的意识形态来掩盖他们的暴虐行为。

original: Roaming brigands and terrorists are stealing everything not nailed down and burning the rest! Raise more troops and stop them!
translation: 零散的土匪和恐怖分子正在掠夺一切能拿走的东西，并烧毁其余的！需要更多的部队来阻止他们！

original: The terrain of China forces everyone to pick their battles carefully. That gives us an opportunity to seize some vulnerable terrain without engaging in all-out warfare.
translation: 中国的地形迫使每个人去谨慎的选择他们的战场。这使我们有机会在不进行全面战争的情况下占领一些易遭到攻击的区域。

original: Maintain divisions in the state for [?Root.MAN_maintain_control_timer|H0] days to pacify bandits in the region.\n
translation: 军队在省内维持[?Root.MAN_maintain_control_timer|H0]天来平息该地区的匪患\n

original: Pacify Bandits In the Northern Countryside
Pacify Bandits In the Eastern Countryside
Pacify Bandits In the Western Countryside
We cannot allow others to develop an atom bomb before us. We must do whatever we can to ensure our technological superiority is not threatened.
translation: 我们不能让别人在我们面前发展原子弹。 我们必须尽一切可能确保我们的技术优势不受到威胁。

original: The terrain of China forces everyone to pick their battles carefully. That gives us an opportunity to seize some vulnerable terrain without engaging in all-out warfare.
translation: 中国的地形迫使每个人去谨慎的选择他们的战斗地点。这使我们有机会在不进行全面战争的情况下占领一些易遭到攻击的区域。

original: Factory work is hard and fraught with many hazards. Improving the conditions for our factory workers will reduce output in the short term, but the long term benefits are worth it.
translation: 工厂工作很辛苦，充满许多危险。改善工厂工人的工作环境将在短期内减少产量，但从长期的收益来看是值得的。

original: History has taught us the horrors of war. We must never let it happen again. It is time for our nation to know peace and prosperity.
translation: 历史告诉我们战争的恐怖。 我们绝不能再让这种事情发生。 现在是时候让我们的国家了解和平与繁荣了。

original: The Soviet demands are bleeding our country dry. We can not allow our so-called "comrades" to exploit us like that.
translation: 苏联的要求正在榨干我们的国家。我们不能让这群所谓的“同志”这样压榨我们。

original: Applies the §YUnternehmen Barbarossa§! National Spirit until the mission's conclusion.\n
translation: 采用§Y巴巴罗萨§!国家精神直到任务结束。\n

original: Already running a war propaganda campaign
translation: 已经开展了战争宣传活动

original: We share a long border with [SOV.GetNameDef] in Korea and Manchuria. A large number of potential flashpoints exist where our forces might clash at any moment. For us, this creates an opportunity to test the Soviet response to a minor provocation.
translation: 我们在朝鲜和满洲与[SOV.GetNameDef]共享了一段漫长的边境。存在这一系列潜在的爆发点我们的武装力量随时都有可能发生冲突。对我们来说，这为测试苏联对轻微挑衅的回应创造了机会。

original: There has been a clash between our border guards and Japanese soldiers at our shared border in Korea. Intelligence sources in Japan report that this may just be the first step in a larger confrontation. We should reinforce the border with Japan immediately.
translation: 在我们与朝鲜的共同边境，我们的边防军和日本士兵之间发生冲突。在日本情报机构报告说，这可能只是更大对抗的第一步。我们应该立即加强与日本的边界。

original: Aerial recon has confirmed major troop movements at the Japanese side of the border. We don't know if or when the Japanese have decided to strike, but we must be ready.
translation: 空中侦察确认了边界日军主要部队的调动。我们不知道日本人是否或者何时决定突袭，但我们必须做好防备。

original: If we want to use the the incident at the Soviet border to Korea, we must strike quickly.
translation: 如果我们想利用苏朝边界的事件，我们必须迅速采取行动。

original: It appears that the Soviets are not backing down from the conflict. At this point, we must either escalate to an armed confrontation or back down ourselves.
translation: 看起来苏联并没有从冲突中退缩。此时，我们必须从升级为武装对抗或者退缩中二择其一。

original: At the current rate, we can only sustain combat operations for so long before we need to break off combat.
translation: 以目前的速度，在需要结束战斗之前我们只能支撑这么长时间。

original: The conflict at the border with the Soviet Union has stalled. Perhaps by escalating further and commiting more troops to the theater, we can still achieve a victory.
translation: 与苏联边界的冲突已经停滞。也许通过进一步扩大事态并增加部队到战区，我们仍然可以取得胜利。

original: Fighting in the disputed region has been going on for a while now, and shows no sign of stopping. We must be prepared to take the next step and see this conflict as the first step in a general war.
translation: 争议地区的战斗已经持续了一段时间，丝毫没有停止的迹象。我们必须准备好采取下一步，将这场冲突将视为一场全面战争的第一步。

original: The danger of this conflict spiralling out of control and becoming a full-scale war between our countries is simply too big. We should cut our loses now and send out diplomatic feelers to the other side.
translation: 这场冲突失控并成为我们两国之间的全面战争的危险实在太大了。我们现在应该减少损失，并向另一方寻求外交接触。

original: Experience from the border clash in Korea:
translation: 来自朝鲜边界冲突的经验：
承担对印度尼西亚的管理权
承担对马来西亚的管理权
承担对印度支那的管理权
添加被移除的§Y军用工厂§!的75%。\n
添加被移除的§Y民用工厂§!的75%。\n
召回保罗·冯·莱托-福尔贝克

original: With the Hohenzollern restored to the throne, the old Lion of East Africa once again offers his services.
translation: 霍亨索伦重回王座之后，往日的东非雄狮希望能再次为帝国效力。

original: Every bullet spent hunting down bandits is one less available for the fight to come. Instead of fighting our own subjects, we should offer them a way to redeem themselves through service to the Emperor.
translation: 用于剿匪的每一发子弹对于即将到来的大战来说都是一种浪费。相对于内斗，我们应该给他们一条通过为皇帝陛下效力来改过自新的道路。

original: Every bullet spent hunting down bandits is one less available for the fight to come. Instead of fighting our own subjects, we should offer them a way to redeem themselves through service to the Emperor.
translation: 用于剿匪的每一发子弹对于即将到来的大战来说都是一种浪费。相对于内斗，我们应该给他们一条通过为皇帝陛下效力来改过自新的道路。

original: Every bullet spent hunting down bandits is one less available for the fight to come. Instead of fighting our own subjects, we should offer them a way to redeem themselves through service to the Emperor.
translation: 用于剿匪的每一发子弹对于即将到来的大战来说都是一种浪费。相对于内斗，我们应该给他们一条通过为皇帝陛下效力来改过自新的道路。

original: Our prisons and work camps are filled with those who once fought against us. We need every soldier and every rifle in the fight for our freedom. The Emperor could show his legendary mercy and grace by giving these criminals a way to redeem themselves through service.
translation: 我们的监狱和劳改营里装满了曾经与我们作对的人。为我们的自由，我们现在需要利用所能利用的每一条枪和每一个战士。皇帝将展现他无尽的仁慈，给予这些罪犯一个改过自新的机会。

original: The former criminals and lowlives have shown that they are willing to sacrifice for their Emperor and can now be safely released back into society.
translation: 那些愿意为皇帝献身的前罪犯和人渣们现在可以重返社会了。

original: In the days of old, the Qing Emperors could call upon their bannermen to fight in their wars. Although times have changed, the same principles apply. The house of the Qing requires the services of their banners once more.
translation: 在以前，大清天子可以召集八旗军为自己战斗。虽时过境迁，然传统依在，大清皇室可以要求八旗军再次为自己效力。

original: Their service complete, the Manchu banners can once again be sent to their homes and families - until they are required once again.
translation: 满洲八旗完成了他们的使命，现在他们可以回家和家人团聚了——直到朝廷再次需要他们的时候。

original: While they don't gain the same economies of scale as major factories - and have a very mixed quality control - distributing weapons production to smaller workshops spread around the country is the best way to increase production in a hurry.
translation: 尽管不如大工厂那样可以通过规模经济节约成本——而且产品质量也参差不齐——把武器交给国内大量的小工坊进行生产是短时间内增加产量最好的方法了。

original: The weapons workshops we created have served their purpose. It is time to return to a more organized form of weapons production.
translation: 我们建立的武器工坊完成了他们的使命，现在是时候回归有组织的规模生产了。

original: With the Railways under our control, we can ensure that some shipments of machine tooling get 'lost' in an 'administrative error'.
translation: 由于铁道在我们的管控之下，我们可以确保一些机床在运输途中因为“管理失误”而“遗失”。

original: Prepare to seize Japanese Arms Depots

The depots and supply dumps spread around the country are poorly guarded. A well-planned and timed assault could take them with a minimum of casualties, giving us access to modern arms and at the same time depriving the Japanese of ammunition and supplies. Spending more time and resources on this will allow us to seize more depots.
translation: 我国境内大量分布的军械库和弹药库并没有什么守备。一场精心准备并且同时执行的袭击可以以最低的代价将他们夺取。我军在得到现代化武器的同时也能造成日本人的弹药短缺。花费更多的时间和资源准备可以让我们夺取更多的军火库。

original: Further preparations can still be made to seize additional depots.\n
translation: 可以进行更加充分的准备以夺取更多的军火库。\n
